title: Toaru Majutsu no Index SS: Biohacker - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Harem   School Life   Sci-fi   Shounen
tags: Determined Protagonist   Flashbacks   Male Protagonist   Psychic Powers   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Unlucky Protagonist
author: Kamachi Kazuma   鎌池和馬
description:
Welcome, Kamijou Touma-kun, to the colorful underground!

Kamijou Touma meets two girls in Academy City’s back alleys.

One is Mitsuari Ayu, a lady of Tokiwadai Middle School with the Metal Stinger power to control people’s minds. The other is Kumokawa Seria, a mysterious genius high school girl who can control people’s minds without any power.

Kamijou is at the mercy of those girls, but those peaceful times do not last long.

That kind time is torn apart by a gigantic creature that towers over them: a dragon. Who is the Biohacker who created it, controls it, and freely gives it the power to fight?

Why is that giant creature pursuing Mitsuari Ayu? Kamijou Touma enters Academy City’s deep darkness to protect the girls.

It all happened one year ago.

It is the summer of Kamijou Touma’s third year of middle school. This is an untold story different from the time he spent with Shokuhou Misaki. Kamijou Touma’s starting point begins here.>
